headline: A Look At Franklin Resources (BEN) Valuation After Alternative Credit Merger And Tokenization Push
summary: Franklin Resources (BEN) is back in focus after Franklin Templeton combined its U.S. and European alternative credit arms under the Benefit Street Partners brand, while also pushing ahead with tokenization efforts in existing fund products. See our latest analysis for Franklin Resources. These moves around alternative credit and tokenization come as the share price sits at US$25.55, with a 30-day share price return of 5.62% and a 1-year total shareholder return of 33.30%. The 3-year total...
